channel.title: RoadMapWP
channel.description: Simple, powerful Roadmap plugin for WordPress

item.title: Change color of "Submit Idea" button
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded: You can already change the color of the Vote buttons and the tags, I also want to be able to change the color of the Submit Idea button

item.title: Integrate with Zapier
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded: It would be cool if this could integrate with Zapier to trigger things when an idea is submitted

item.title: Add compact view
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded: The current display of ideas looks nice but takes up a lot of space for each idea. Would be nice to have a more compact view.

item.title: Filter by comments
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded: would be nice to see only ideas that have been commented on

item.title: Add more columns to roadmap shortcode/block
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded:
Current roadmap shortcode/block only has two columns, one for Up Next and one for On Roadmap.
There are other statuses an Idea can have, would be nice to choose which ones to display as attributes in the roadmap shortcode/block

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Done! Our roadmap block now supports all Status terms

item.title: give admins ability to change status of an idea on the frontend
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded: I don't want to have to go into the WP dashboard/backend to update the status of ideas, I want to be able to do it from the frontend.

item.title: Undefined variable warning
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: Using only the free version there are two warnings on the taxonomies page. See screenshot: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/u0gcyyh0s7djqx5ui5crp/shot_240105_000425.jpg?rlkey=zca0pkq34dqhkk7dqxvr5c4tf&dl=0

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Thanks for the heads up, this issue has been fixed and will be included in the next update!

item.title: No blocks.
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: For blocks, do I need the pro version? If not, then there's a bug, they don't show up. If yes, there's no indication in the KB articles.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Yes blocks are a pro only feature, I'll try to figure out how to make that more clear, thank you for your feedback!

item.title: On the dashboard show the list first
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: When clicking on "RoadMap" in the left admin bar, it'll take you to the settings page. I think it would be better if it would take you to the list of submitted ideas. The settings page is not something that you use often, it could be the last sub-item. - Ideas - Taxonomies - Settings

item.title: Roadmap shortcode
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: There is no indication of what happens if I use the [roadmap] shortcode without any parameters.

item.title: roadmap_tabs shortcode doesn't work
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: If I add the roadmap_tabs shortcode on a page it will only display the shortcode on the front-end. I use the theme twentysixteen.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: I just tested in twenty sixteen and it worked fine. Can you show me a screenshot of your implementation?
Blocks are a pro only feature.

item.title: Change Statuses/Column Names
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded:
As a product manager, I want to change the names of the columns/statuses, so I can align them with our development process.
Minimum: Change the status names & they are reflected in the column names they correspond to.
Medium: Change status names & column names independently, and map each status to a column in a 1:1 relationship.
Ideal: Change, add, and remove status names and column names independently, and map one or more statuses to a column. Change the order of the columns.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
In our latest update (1.4.0) we've added the ability to delete the existing terms in the Status taxonomy, and to add your own.
So if you don't like "Up Next" and want it to be "Coming Soon" instead, simply delete Up Next, and add Coming Soon.
The roadmap and roadmap_tabs blocks will automatically detect all existing terms so you'll be able to select the ones you want to use when you add the block to a page.
Also, if you want to control the order of the columns you can use the shortcode instead of the block, and the columns will appear in the order in which you type them in.
So if you type [roadmap status="Up Next, On Roadmap, Closed"] the columns will appear in order from left to right, Up Next, then On Roadmap, then Closed.

item.title: See if an idea has already been submitted
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: Adding some kind of ajax fuzzy search to see if an idea has been suggested already would be great for cutting down on duplicate ideas.

item.title: Add a class to "vote" buttons if already upvoted
item.dc:creator: johndoe@email.com
item.content:encoded: Adding a class to a "vote" button if it has already been upvoted would allow for additional styling to quickly see which have already been voted on by a user.

item.title: Add A "Theme" to the Colors
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded:
It would be nice to have default theme color sets for quick and easy application of colors.
Maybe have a button with all the color codes, then when you click it, it automatically fills in those swatches, but doesn't save immediately, so you can customize the colors based on the color set that was selected
